1.content:
On his travels across a country in a different world not unlike that of America, a young man of 20 was riding in his red sports car when it suddenly breaks down in front of a nearby house. The house was HUGE; it had to be the largest he had ever seen. It was over 300 feet long and 300 feet tall, with all three floors of the house looking like three good-sized stadiums stacked on top of each other in their scope.

With much reluctance, the man knocked on the very, very tall front door, the doorknob of the house itself well over 40 feet above his head. He saw a smaller cut of a door for someone of his size on the far right corner of the door, but everything else seemed to be massive in size.

It was then that the man remembered the note from his recently deceased uncle that told him that he inherited a "large house" quite a distance from his home. He was told to first check it out to see if he wanted to live there. He was told in his will that 4 supposedly beautiful women ran the house almost entirely on their own, and that they were "unbelievable". Could this be the house his uncle had left for him?

A closer look at the directions he was given during the will's reading indicated that it was, indeed, the same house he was supposed to be at in the current moment. How lucky to have broken down here! The man waited almost a full minute before he got a response from anyone if they were home, seeing the opening from the tinier door that he could fit through. It was one of the four supposedly beautiful maids who ran the house!

"Welcome, Mr. Robert Thornbear!" the woman said with a smile.

The one who opened the door for Robert just then was...

11.content:
“Are you Robert Thornbear?” the woman at the door asked once more. She had long, brunette-colored hair and green eyes. Her attire consisted of a pretty, long, dark green dress with a while apron and frills, as well as a big, white ribbon on the back of the uniform. On her feet was a pair of short, brown boots that kind of clashed with her green attire, but Robert didn’t really care.

“I am indeed Robert Thornbear”, he said with a high level of confidence as he showed the maid in front of the house his I.D., pulling it out of his pocket.

“I see. Welcome then, Bobby!” the now-convinced woman said as she hugged Robert in a tight embrace. “We’re so glad you’re here!”

“‘We’?”

“Yeah, silly. There are four maids here!”

“And which maid would YOU be?”

“I’m Ria Hawkins, and I’m an energetic, friendly 20 year old woman!”

“I’m Robert. I’m a not so energetic 20 year old man who apparently inherited a house that would fit a stadium full of people in.”

“And it’s all yours!” Ria told Robert as she pulled on his arms until he was in the house, the giant door closing quickly behind him. “And so am I!”

“W-w-wait a moment, we just met..”

“Just kidding!” Ria teased the man in front of her. “Hey! Do you like video games?”

“A little bit. I haven’t played any in a while..”

“Would you want to play video games with me, Bobby?” Ria asked with hopeful eyes.

“Well…I guess so. Though I’m quite hungry from my trip..”

“No problem! I’m no ordinary maid; I have magical abilities!”

“Wait! Magic?”

Robert was befuddled by Ria’s “magical abilities” comment. Magic wasn’t real (and if it was, people certainly wouldn’t come out in the open to admit it), and if Ria didn’t mean it in that way, she might have meant in a more suggestive manner. Robert was having second thoughts about entering through that door..

“What’s your favorite food?” Ria asked Robert as the two walked through the house together. The walls were tall and brown from all sides, and they were numerous staircases everywhere; some were normal sized, some were big, and some were really small. He also noticed a foray of various artwork before him, some paintings and sculptures measuring up to 50 feet in size! It came to no surprise to Ria that Robert kept making several pauses as he walked around in the glorious house and its many wonderful sights.

“Your uncle sure loved collecting weird crap!” Ria said with a smile.

“I don’t think it’s crap..”, Robert defended his dead uncle.

“Well, you don’t have to listen to me. It’s just my opinion”, noted Ria as they were only feet away from the kitchen at this point.

Even the kitchen was glorious! The dining table looked bigger than any gym he’s ever been in, and the kitchen itself looked like something from a 5-star French restaurant. Never before had Robert had seen so many kitchen utensils in one place.

“Again I ask you; what’s your favorite food?” Ria asked with anxious anticipation, holding out nothing but her hands in front of a gigantic table.

“I like cheeseburgers and fries, personally”, he replied, watching the young maid smile in response.

“Okay then! Time to prove to you that my magic isn’t just puff and smoke!”

Unfortunately for Robert, one thing Ria didn’t tell him was that her spells had a high chance of backlash. A VERY high chance. Though maybe Ria would catch a break for once and everything would work.

Unfortunately for Ria, her worries about her spell going awry came true, as Robert was soon being hit by several patties across his face and shirt. This was soon followed by the ketchup and mustard floating around and squirting his pants almost entirely with the two aforementioned condiments. But that wasn't all; even water and soda ran down his head from above. At the end Robert was a mess, more so than he probably ever had been in his life. He was about to yell at Ria for her clumsiness until he saw the maid cry into her dress. While she initially found it funny, more and more she realized what a klutz she was, and her self-esteem fell like a rock.

"I'm horrible, aren't I?!" the maid yelled (albiet muffled from her head being in her clothes). "I can't do anything right! I bet you wonder how I even answered the door correctly!"

"Ria, stop! I'm not mad! Everyone makes mistakes!" Robert yelled as he walked over to the upset woman, slipping up on a patty on the ground and falling on his face.

"No! You ARE mad! Look at you! If someone did that to me, I'd be mad too!" Ria continued to cry, her face as red as the ketchup smeared on Robert's clothes.

"R-R-Ria..", a short of breath Robert said, taking over his stain-covered pants as he walked closer to the maid. "I told you; I'm not mad."

"No. Stop it! you're only trying to make me feel better!"

Before Ria could continue her pessimistic beating of herself up, she was hugged by Robert. Unable to respond any other way, Ria too wrapped her arms around the young man.

"Ria, I'm glad you offered to make me food. That much is enough."

"Robert, I'm still sorry!" Ria apologized once again.

"No worries", he told her as he kissed her on the cheek, causing her to lighten up. "Now why don't we make some food together?"

"But I'm a maid. You're not supposed to help ME; I'm supposed to help YOU!" Ria reminded her master.

"But I don't think of you as a maid; I think of you as a bright, kind woman."

"Really?!"

"Yep. What do you say, Ria? You would to help me cook?"

"Of course! Thank you, Bobby!"

"That's the spirit, Ria!"

More importantly, though, Ria came back down around this time. The pretty brunette had her tail done in two twin downward pigtails, with cute little heart ear rings on her ears. There on the patio Ria looked at the beautiful night sky above them, sighing happily as she unintentionally grabbed hold of Robert's hand with her own.

"Oops!" she said when she noticed her grabbing hold of Robert's arm. "Sorry."

"Don't be, Ria", he told her as he then placed his hand on top of hers.

"If I didn't know any better, Bobby, I'd say you were coming on to me", teased Ria.

The two were silent for a little afterwards, enjoying their view of the night sky above. That is, until Robert noted something about his female acquaintance's sky viewing; she refused to look at the moon.

"I notice you're not looking at the moon, Ria. Is something wrong?"

"O-O-Of course not! Don't be silly, B-Bobby!"

"Ria, you're hiding something. I can tell."

"*Gulp!* You're right. I AM hiding something from you. You see, Bobby, during the full moon, our powers are at their peak, and even a newbie like myself can temporarily gain vast amounts of magic during the time it's up."

"That doesn't sound so bad.."

"Except I have no control of my body at the time. The other maids and I, for some reason, end up giving in to our urges, often becoming bigger, scarier, and even a little sex-crazed."

"You mean you could grow to 20 feet tall and try to have sex with me?"

Ria looked at her hands and noticed that they were slowly growing before her eyes, her finger nails slowly replaced with cat claws. Not only that, but she saw fangs slowly forming out of her front teeth.

“W-W-What’s happening to me?!” the worried tomboy wondered, running away from Robert.

“Ria, wait!!” Robert pleaded.

“No! Bobby, I’m already started to change...meow!”

Ria placed her hands on her mouth when she heard her speak just then.

“Oh no! I’m turning into a cat, or maybe even a cat girl!”

Ria’s worrying wasn’t helping by the growth of her hair, which became fuller, more twisted, and changed to a dirtier shade of brown. It was over 15 feet long now. Her ears slowly started to transform as well, changing slowly into car ears as they grew to several times their current size.

“M-My ears!! My hair! They’re gigantic, meow!” Ria whined, her feet being the next thing to change. They slowly changed form until they looked slightly like a cat’s, with claws replacing her toe nails. Her sandals were ripped to shreds as her feet grew in size to match her recently grown ears, hair, and hands.

“Ahhh! My sandals! They were so nice, too!”

Ria’s next transformation involved her butt, where she felt something slowly cut out of it; it was a cat tail! At first it was only a few feet long, but then it ballooned in size until it was over 20 feet long! Her butt grew to several times its size as well to accompany her new tail, knocking poor Ria on the ground.

“Ria…!” a panicked Robert said as he looked on at his changing friend/maid.

Ria’s legs and arms then grew quickly to accompany the rest of her growing stature. This was followed by the growth of her torso, which also ballooned in size until it matched the rest of her growing frame. Her cat fangs grew even bigger as her head expanded in size as well, completing her transformation into a 25 foot tall cat girl.

“Bobby, I’m scared, meow!” Ria told her friend, hugging him like a plush doll.

“Ria, it’s okay! You seem to still have control of your body!”

Ria ran over to the boy quickly and picked him up, feeling his stomach to see if he still had a pulse. He did, but it was a slow one.

At the time there was only one other woman working there - Michelle - and she had her hands full quite a bit.

The only thing that I was told in advance is that I would have to take a physical test on my person before I began. I agreed to it, and as you can see, the 'test' was me being injected with a form of blood that would grant me slightly magical abilities.

Bobby, there exist in this world a few gifted people with the ability to use magic. A lot of these people are often frowned upon in their communities, and some are even disowned by their family. Erika is the one of the latter examples. She was rejected by her own mother when she found out she had magic running within her blood. "Is everything okay?"

She could guess the response she would get, she was right.

"NO!! I'm trapped with a bunch of girls who want to eat me! If you've come to do that, then make it quick!" Robert yelled without sticking his head out.

Michelle sighed and was about to shut the door when she heard a voice behind her say, "I'll try and talk to him." Who was it?
15131121.title: "Ah hell I'm back here."

choices: He gets up and has a chat with her.
Ellen barges in and sees the two of them together.
151311211.content:
"Ria! Do you think now is a good time?" Michelle asked, angry.

"I need to do this", Ria sighed.

"Just don't do any magic, or you can leave!" Michelle muttered. Ria went into the room and sat down on a chair next to Robert's bed.

"Please, Master Robert, I want to talk about my actions", Ria said in a rare, polite tone.

"Your actions?! You showed me I ain't welcome here! Hell, if I stayed here you would probably try and eat me in the night!" Robert yelled, not budging from under his covers.

Ria just shook her head and muttered to herself.

"I really am a freak..."

Robert paused and thought about that.

"Why do you call yourself that?" he asked, with a bit of concern. He got the idea that she thought she could be better than the one she would serve.

"That's what my Mother called me the last time I saw her", an upset Ria choked up. Robert slowly peeped his head out of the covers.

<Better be careful. This might be a ruse...>
151311211.title: Making peace.

choices: Robert shrugs it off, thinking it was an accident.
...it could be true...
1513112111.content:
Robert watched Ria carefully from under the covers. He wasn't ready yet to forgive the maid, but this sudden confession did get his attention. It also helped that Ria looked like she was on the verge of tears. He couldn't help but be curious.

"What happened?" Robert asked as he sat up in the bed to talk at equal level.

Ria wiped her tears as she looked up at Robert trying to compose herself.

"Sorry, we're not friendly enough for back story yet." She gave him a small, sad smile as she looked him in the eyes.

Robert grumbled a bit before letting the matter drop...for now.

"It took me 3 months to talk to Master about that. And he was the only adult I've ever respected, Robert. It's not you; I just have trouble trusting people, that's all. If you ask the others I'm sure you'll get the same response. Don't take it personally, okay?"

Ria winked a small wink at Robert. Despite having been completely terrified of this very girl only a short time ago, Robert had to admit that she was a lot nicer than he'd originally thought. Cuter, too. Still, he'd just been through a very strange and dangerous first meeting, and he still didn't know want he was going to do with all he'd learned. It was too much too fast. And as if she had been reading his mind, which he really hoped these girls couldn't do, Ria spoke up.

"So, are you going to stay? Or have I scared you off completely?"

Robert could see the hopefulness in her eyes along with the worry. But he couldn't give an answer yet. Not til he thought it over more.

"Sorry," he said slowly not wanting to hurt her feelings, for mamy reasons. "I've been through a lot. I need sometime to think it over, okay?" He could see a little gloom in her eyes.

"I understand. But until you heal completely we'll continue to care for you. It's the least I can do." Ria got up and walked to the door. "We're also repairing your car, too. It should be ready and all fixed up before you're healed, for when you're...you're ready." She trailed off at the last part.

Robert felt a little guilty at her words but then something she said got his attention. "Wait!" he said so suddenly that Ria nearly jumped. "What happened to my car?"

Ria looked at him, a little concerned. "You crashed into a tree out on the highway. Ellen found you and brought you back here. Don't you remember?"

"Oh, right. Sorry, a little slow in the head at the moment. I remember." But he didn't. Robert could not remember hitting that tree. He just smiled at Ria as she just shrugged and left him to his lonesome. He laid back down and looked up at the ceiling. "This wasn't right." Yes he was freaked out while driving, but he never once remembered being reckless enough to go off the road. It didn't make sense.

But as Robert laid there, he slowly remembered something. While turning one bend in the road, the steering wheel seemed to suddenly turn on its own in his hands. He remembered trying to realign in the wheel before everything went black. Under normal conditions Robert wouldn't think anything of it, but then he'd just learned about magic.

A horrible thought entered Robert's mind. Was it possible that the maids used their magic to try and kill him?

choices: "A former maid of ours tried to sabotage his car."
"It was just a crack in the breaks."
15131121111.content:
"Nah that could'nt have happened. If I were to be killed then people would suspect them. And I bet thier magic can't warp reality so that I don't exist." he muttered.

A knock at the door was heard. "Go ahead." he said.

In came Erika. She was holding a large cake covered in sugar and strawberries.

"Um, excuse me." she said, curtsying.

"Is that for me?" Robert asked.

She nodded and asked if he would like it. Robert was hesitant; it could be covered in poison. But then he looked at the maid and thought
<I don't think she would be able to kill me. If the cops didn't get her, then the guilt would.>

"Sure. I do feel hungry now that I think about it. Thanks."

She placed the cake on his lap. "I hope you get well soon, Master."

The maid left and Robert could not help but smile at her cuteness. As he tucked into his food, Michelle was looking at the car and sighed.

"What's with the sigh?" Ellen asked her.

"I've looked over the car, and I think I know why Master's car went haywire", she frowned.

"Don't leave me in suspense! What is it?" Ellen questioned, on tiptoes.

choices: Robert's "Tell me what?"
Ria's "Is it true?"
151311211111.content:
"Was it Ria? I'll kick her ass into the middle of next week!" Ellen said in response.

"No. At least she's not my prime suspect." Michelle said.

"Then....Would it be her?" Ellen said in a somewhat fearful tone.

"I would say yes to it."

The person they were talking about was a woman called Aria. She was the first maid at the house back when Robert's uncle was still alive.
She got into many arguments with the others and left, swearing revenge on them all.

"Of course now it's obvious. If he were to be killed then we would most likely be jailed and Aria would buy the mansion!" Ellen said.

"Exactly. Now I don't think we should tell Master just yet. But we better tell the others about this. We need to win Master's trust back."

Just then they heard a voice. Was it?
151311211111.title: "A former maid of ours tried to sabotage hi...

choices: Tell the truth that a former maid is suspected.
Convince Robert they were talking about his wellbeing.
1513112111111.content:
Robert poked out from the doorway, he looked rather dishevelled but thanks to the magic of his maids he looked much better than a usual car crash victim. Some white bandages covered his midriff and he seemed pale but was otherwise seemingly fine, save for some light shivering due to his bare upper body.

"Master Robert?! What are you doing?" Michelle asked with some shock, it pained the woman inwardly to see the one she was charged with serving to look like that. Being sort of the head among the maids she felt more responsible than most.

The man coughed slightly before saying "I uh wanted to check on my car, was wanting to see if I could maybe get insurance on it. Think I did a real number on it." Robert thought back to how the steering wheel went on its own. Had the maids done that? Robert chose to give the benefit of the doubt on that, after all hadn't they been sworn to serve him and were loved by his Uncle. It had to count for something surely.

Ellen gave a little smile before saying "Sorry, we got to fixing it once you were done. Just in case you wanted to....." she trailed off not wanting to finish her sentence and looked down to her shoes.

"Master Robert you should really get back to bed, your still not well." Michelle stated as she got close to her Master.

Robert though took a step back and lifted a hand up. "Look I know your concerned, but nothing's broken. Besides I think my Uncle said I was always one to be up and about, think that probably bit me in the ass though." he said with a sigh.

Michelle bit her lip before saying "Did Ria apologize?"

"Yeah, we got off on the wrong foot. She can be cute when she wants to be though." Robert responded with a little chuckle.

That brought the two maids some relief that their new master was capable of forgiveness and looking at the better side of others. Michelle waved her hands and instantly a large red nightgown for men appeared on Robert. "If your intent on walking Master at least stay warm, the days are getting colder." she stated.

Robert smiled and said "Thanks. Though you didn't answer my question, what were you going to tell me?"

Ellen looked away to the car briefly before at Michelle, what would they do?
1513112111111.title: Robert's "Tell me what?"

choices: Robert becomes Mistress Roberta
Robert becomes Roberta the Maid, with a new Robert the Master
15133.content:
Robert recovers from the sight of what he just experienced. He felt shaky but also angry.

"So just to be clear, I am in charge of this house as it belongs to me?" he clarified.

"That's right, Robert", stated Michelle.

"And you all work for me, keeping this house clean and safe right?"

"Yes, Robert", agreed Michelle. Robert then turned to Ria.

"I don't like being threatened. This is my house and I won't have anyone threaten my life, especially not someone who I am entrusting my property to. How long had you worked for my uncle?"

Ria stiffened as his tone and the use of the word 'had' became clear. It was clear what Robert was getting at.

"About 2 years", she replied, worried.

"Well, 8 weeks' termination pay seems fair for two years of loyalty, but I will throw in an extra two. Thank you for your services, Ria, but I don't think I will need them any longer!" he declared.

"You insulted me!" she protested. "It was a joke!"

"And you threatened to kill me! In my own house! It's weird enough to have magical maids, but I won't have an attempted murderer working for me! Thanks for your services, Ria; but they are no longer required."

Ria turned pale and looked at Michelle for help.

"Robert, I can't imagine how upset you were about this. I know what Ria did was terrible, but I am pleading with you to let her stay! She really is a good person, she just gets hot headed", implored Michelle.

Robert paused for a moment, before he looked to Michelle.

“Michelle, can you transfer magic from one person to another?” he asked.

Michelle nodded wearily. "Yes, but..what are you getting at?"

“Then, if Ria hands her magic over to me, so that I know she won’t try this again, she can stay.”

“For how long?” squealed Ria.

“For as long as I decide it is necessary! It's your choice, Ria!" he told her.

Ria turned white, but nodded. She drooped her head down.

“Here…here we go!” stammered a nervous Michelle as she began the process.
15133.title: Ria is out

choices: Talk as they drink tea
Ria surprises Roberta by kissing her
151331.content:
Robert starting glimmering before he felt blinded by light. He tried to cry out, but nothing came out.

"Ellen, I require aid! NOW!" cried out Michelle.

Ellen took Robert's left hand while Michelle took his right. However, all that happened was a loud bang as both girls were sent flying. Robert felt like he was stretched....before he felt an explosion in his head and his eyes closed. He awoke to see four tiny figures on his mounds.

"Hey wait, I don't have mounds! What the..." Robert stopped before realizing he could speak again. And he wasn't wearing anything and he seemed to have a well endowed chest that only women have.

"What's going on?" he demanded.

"You sure are a beautiful woman, Mistress Roberta!" giggled Ria.

"Ria, hush!" demanded Michelle.

"Mistress..." Robert asked, blinking. "W-What the hell is wrong with my voice? Did you guys shrink yourselves and....I have a p..."

"Yes, Master Robert, I am afraid when I transferred Ria's power to you....I inadvertently turned you into a woman!" revealed Michelle, interrupting Robert from saying a vulgar word.

"And you are a giant!" added Ellen, somewhat amused.

"What?" gasped Robert.

"Well when you got the power, you started to expand. Ellen and I tried to stop you, but we were unsuccessful!" admitted Michelle.

Robert stood up, grabbing the four girls before they fell. She reached down and screamed when she realized she was indeed a woman.

"Focus, Master Robert, and you will shrink back!" began Ellen, but Robert was freaking out. The maid started to squeal as their own clothes flew off them.

"Master Robert, please give us back our outfits!" pleaded Erika, blushing deep red.

"Master Robert, if you focus, you will shrink and we can all get our clothes. Please try to relax and it will be okay!" advised Michelle, trying to cover herself.

"Ellen, stop feeling me up!" wailed Ria, less than amused.

Robert reminded herself that she needed to relax. And in a flash, there were five naked girls on the ground.

"Let's go inside and have a cup of tea!" suggested Michelle, clicking her fingers. The maids had clothes, and Robert was in a tank top and denim shorts.

Robert was now 6' in height, with the same hair and eye color, but with a large bust. The new mistress was surprised that Ria squeezed her hand.

"You will be okay, sexy girl! Sorry about the threatening teeth thing!" she whispered.

"It's okay now!" Robert replied. "I forgive you."

Ellen has a big grin on her face as she whispers something to the other two, which makes Erika blush and Michelle frown.
151331.title: From Master to Mistress

choices: All four make an honest attempt at trying to play something
They try to explain why the song won't play
The song starts playing on its own?
152.content:
"We'd better no.," Michelle decided. "You can never tell how people would react to news like that. He might be the jumpy sort, and we've scared the poor guy enough as it is."

"Well, as I said, I guess I'm siding with Michelle", Erika said.

"And my vote makes a 3-1 majority!" Ria added jubilantly. "I knew you'd make the right choice, Michelle!"

"OK, it's all well and good that we've decided on a course of action, but the fact remains that he'll still have some questions about that little show we put on for him. How do we explain away that?" Ellen asked.

"Oh, I don't think it'll be that hard! We just need a little brainstorm session, that's all!" Michelle said.

What ensued was a flurry of whispering before the maids finally broke their huddle.

Back at the entrance, Robert was still waiting patiently. After the unexpected welcome, he was all set to leave as soon as the maids went into the other room, but he quickly calmed down and decided to do the polite thing and wait for them to come back. Anyhow, what good would leaving do? As long as his car was broken down, he wasn't going anywhere. Besides, a guy doesn't just walk away from four cute girls and an inherited mansion that had to be worth a fortune, does he?

When the maids re-entered the foyer, Michelle immediately extended a hand in apology;

"Master Robert, I... I think we got off on the wrong foot."

"It's alright," Rob responded, returning the handshake. "I kinda snapped a little there. I really shouldn't have. Well I guess you're the 'beautiful, unbelievable' women that my uncle told me about, huh?"

Michelle blushed in flattery. "Oh, good grief, he said that about us? Wow! Oh dear... Well, we haven't introduced ourselves properly, have we? How rude of us... I'm Michelle."

"I'm Ria."

"I'm Erika.."

"I'm Ellen."

"Nice to meet all of you", Robert said, giving each of them a warm handshake as they said their names, "So, from your outfits, I guess you're all maids here. Wow, my uncle had it really good, didn't he? That'd explain why all of you are here, but... the confetti..."

"That was me!" Ria spoke up, raising her hand. (She had been the one who had cast the confetti blasting spell, so she wasn't really lying when she said this.) "Sorry about that. I guess I was a little too enthusiastic."

"Oh, that's alright," Rob said, "Well, I guess that just leaves..."

"The music!" Erika piped up. "Uh...you see, one of the most awesome things about this place is the sound system! It's voice commanded, see, and we instructed it to play a big fanfare when you entered! It can play literally any song you can think of! Here, I'll show you..." She turned around and looked up at the ceiling, "Stereo! Fur Elise, please!"

As she said this, she secretly waved her hands to conjure up the music, making sure Robert didn't see them move. To her hidden delight, the spell worked, as the ever-recognizable melody began to fill the foyer.

"Wow!" Robert exclaimed, visibly impressed, "Where are the speakers?"

"Hidden away!" Erika quickly said, explaining away the absence of speakers in the foyer. "Doesn't clash with the decorating at all!"

"Can I try it?"

"Sure!"

"Alright..." Rob walked forward and looked up at the ceiling, "Stereo! Let's see... How about Paint It Black?"

"Eep!" Erika squeaked quietly. She wasn't familiar with rock music at all. Luckily for her, Ellen made the save, waving her hands while Rob's back was turned, which caused the famous Rolling Stones song to begin to play.

"Man, the sound quality on this thing is great!" he said, humming along, "OK, OK, one more... Oh, I know! Let's see if it has any heavy metal!"

The four maids gulped at once. None of them were familiar with the genre at all, and all of them were worried that Rob's suspicions might be raised if he picked something they couldn't play. Would he buy an excuse like "The sound system was messing up" or "The stereo doesn't know that song", or was the charade about to be over? Were they overreacting, or would it really be that big of a deal if he didn't hear the song he wanted?

"Stereo! Disposable Heroes, please!"

"Hey! Why isn't it playing?" Robert asked, a little annoyed.

info.description:
A young man ends up in his dead uncle's gigantic house, where he finds four beautiful maids working there. However, these wonderful laides are more than what they seem..

Only two rules;

1.) No killing/squishing/insertion of the main character.
2.) You must leave at least two different options for each chapter.

Otherwise, enjoy! Check out the individual chapters for more information on our magical maid heroines. Here's a brief description of each of them;

Robert

Age: 20
Height: 5'10"
Eye color: Auburn
Hair color: Dark red
Casual attire: Black t-shirt, grey sweatpants

A man who doesn't like to sit still; he prefers to go head on into things than to wait for them. He has a hard time adjusting to owning a house with four women in it, but soon her befriends not as maids, but as friends.

Ria

Age: 20
Height: 5'4"
Eye color: Green
Hair color: Brunette, long
Maid attire: Long, dark green dress with white apron and frills, as well as a big, white ribbon on the back. Also, a pair of short, brown boots
Casual attire: Short, black dress with black heels to match

An energetic, slightly tomboyish woman. She takes care of the washing and drying of clothes in the household. Her magic abilities are the weakest of of the four maids and have a high chance of backfiring. She loves television and video games and would rather play all day than work.

Erika

Age: 18
Height: 5'0"
Eye color: Blue
Hair color: Black, short
Maid attire: Dark blue Victorian maid outfit and black boots
Casual attire: Pink t-shirt, shorts

A shy girl who just graduated from high school. Her magic abilities are slowly developing, and they backfire less often than Ria's do. She enjoys nature and loves to be outside, where she takes care of the garden. She is quite shy around men and has never kissed one before.


Ellen

Age: 19
Height: 5'2"
Eye color: Brown
Hair color: Red in twin braids
Maid attire: Black French Maid outfit with black shoes to match
Casual attire: Sleeveless shirt and a medium-length skirt

Kind, generous, and a bit of a flirt, Ellen is the kind of girl who would rather stop arguments than begin them. Her magic is the strongest and most stable of the four maids, and she has the most advanced abilities in her possession as well. She sometimes butts heads with Michelle, though, especially concerning her fondness for dressing light; unlike the other maids, she has no problem with showing off her body. She also loves to flirt with men, especially Robert, who she develops a crush on.

Michelle

Age: 23
Height: 5'8"
Eye color: Blue
Hair color: Long, blonde
Maid attire: Bright orange shirt and skirt with dark red ribbons on the back, orange high heels
Casual attire: Light-colored long dress

The oldest and most motherly of the four maids. She takes care of most of the work around the house, including vacuuming, sweeping, and making the meals. Sometimes the workload gets to her, but she can always rely on her friends to help her. Her magic is almost on the same level as Ellen's, and the two sometimes tend to argue with one another.


Tiamat

Age: 22
Height: 6'5"
Eye color: Crystal blue
Hair color: Long, purple
Maid attire: Hair in a pony tail with a black scrunchy tying it back, a shoulder-less maid outfit that shows a bit of cleavage, a purple skirt with a white apron over it, and red shoes
Casual attire: Yellow shirt, blue jeans, and red boots

Robert's beautiful childhood friend two years his senior. In addition to being very tall, she has an amazing, model-like figure, with huge breasts as well to show off. In some paths of the story she visits Robert to check in on his mansion, as he invited her.
